name: purchases
description: Entity capturing supplier purchase orders, invoice metadata, and payment status.

name: purchase_items
description: Entity listing the line items per purchase, tracking product, quantity, and pricing totals.

name: sales
description: Entity describing customer sales invoices, totals, and fulfillment status.

name: sale_items
description: Entity capturing each product sold within a sale, including quantities and pricing.

name: customers
description: Entity storing customer contact information, optional details, and running balance.

name: transactions
description: Entity logging financial transactions linked to references, accounts, and descriptive notes.
columns:
type,string,no
reference_type,string,no
reference_id,bigInteger,no
amount,decimal,no
account_id,bigInteger,no
date,datetime,no
description,text,yes
